text: Silkwood is a 1983 American biographical drama movie directed by Mike Nichols and starring Meryl Streep, Cher, Kurt Russell, Craig T. Nelson, Fred Ward, Ron Silver, Diana Scarwid, Tess Harper, Charles Hallahan, Bruce McGill, M. Emmet Walsh. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was nominated for 5 Academy Awards in 1984. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1983 drama movies Category:1980s biographical movies Category:1983 LGBT movies Category:American biographical movies Category:1980s American drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Mike Nichols Category:Movies set in Oklahoma Category:Movies about nuclear technology Category:Movies about nuclear accidents Category:Movies about whistleblowing Category:Movies set in the 1970s
title: Silkwood
